T04sanss01u:5: tīvraṃ punaḥ punar anantam aśāntacittais tac chrotum ādaram udārataraṃ bhajadhvam //
T04sanss01u:6: śrutvā ... pāpaṃ anuddhatâtmā pūrvârjitaṃ ca vipulaṃ kṣapayaty aśeṣam /
T04sanss01u:7: aprāptapūrvam api saukhyam avāpnuvanti hāniṃ sukhāc ca na kadācid api prayānti //
T04sanss01u:8: sambodhisatvasukham uttamam akṣaya ... apy asamasaṃpadam āpnuvanti /
T04sanss01u:9: tad dharmaratnam atidurlabham apy alabdhaṃ labdhakṣaṇāḥ
T04sanss01u:11: āyāntu ca tribhuvanâikahitasya vākyaṃ śrotuṃ prasannamanasaḥ
T04sanss01u:15: sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyâdarato 'khilāṃś ca vandyān /
T04sanss01u:18: na ca kiñcid apūrvam atra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgranthanakauśalaṃ mamâsti /
T04sanss01u:19: atâiva na me parârthayatnaḥ svamano bhāvayituṃ mamêdam
T04sanss01u:21: mama tāvad anena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ /
T04sanss01u:22: yadi matsamadhātur eva paśyed aparo 'py enam ato 'pi sârthako 'yam //
T04sanss01u:27: ntyate hitaṃ punar apy eṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ //
T04sanss01u:30: durlabhâṣṭākṣaṇanirvṛttir durlabho manuṣyapratilambho durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpatviśuddhir durlabho buddhôtpādo /
T04sanss01u:37: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyalokae iti //
T04sanss01u:40: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca na priyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:41: tadâtmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yat taṃ rakṣāmi nêtaram /
T04sanss01u:44: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matir dṛḍhā //
T04sanss01u:46: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām /
T04sanss01u:47: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati cittaṃ mahāpuruṣāṇām //
T04sanss01u:74: te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti /
T04sanss01u:75: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī /
T04sanss01u:97: ye sadâdhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣûpapadyati bodhayi cittam /
T04sanss01u:105: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipannêho mahayāne /
T04sanss01u:106: ye pratipannêho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān //
T04sanss01u:107: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddhâbhedyā /
T04sanss01u:111: teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ //
T04sanss01u:112: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmmaḥ /
T04sanss01u:114: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sada dhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhir /
T04sanss01u:121: ye tu śubhôpacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyās te imi śraddadhi hetubalena //
T04sanss01u:123: nôta tu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato imi dharmmān //
T04sanss01u:126: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ /
T04sanss01u:128: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati /
T04sanss01u:132: śraddhāyām ānanda yogaḥ karaṇīyêdaṃ tathāgato vijñapayatîti //
T04sanss01u:137: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt tad yathâryasiṃhaparipṛcchāyāṃ /
T04sanss01u:146: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ //
T04sanss01u:166: iti hi kulaputra bodhicittam ebhiś cânyaiś câpramāṇair guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgatam iti //
T04sanss01u:186: jayamateś ca bodhisatvasya pṛthivī vidāram adāt /
T04sanss01u:188: sa hi śūnyatāṃ nâdhimuktavān śūnyatāvādini ca pratighaṃ kṛtavān //
T04sanss01u:195: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇâdhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet /
T04sanss01u:196: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu pu-
T04sanss01u:199: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenâtikramitum /
T04sanss01u:200: yāvad anabhilāpyânabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum
T04sanss01u:205: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ /
T04sanss01u:210: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svâdhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati /
T04sanss01u:213: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanâtaḥ prajñêndriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate /
T04sanss01u:215: tad evam eṣā śūnyatânadhimuktir mahāyānânabhiratiś câsaṃpūrṇâdhimukticittacaryasyâpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate /
T04sanss01u:225: na câtrêcchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītârthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate /
T04sanss01u:248: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nâsti tyāgêti /
T04sanss01u:249: evam ihânyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā
T04sanss01u:252: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann anutpāditabodhicittaḥ
T04sanss01u:257: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ /
T04sanss01u:258: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya
T04sanss01u:259: yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittôtpādāya /
T04sanss01u:261: utpādyânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti /
T04sanss01u:262: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca
T04sanss01u:265: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ praṇidadhati /
T04sanss01u:266: tato 'pi durlabhatamās te satvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
T04sanss01u:269: mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati /
T04sanss01u:272: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanss01u:279: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena
T04sanss01u:282: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrârciṣmatā tathāgatena
T04sanss01u:285: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa
T04sanss01u:286: tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenêty ādi //
T04sanss01u:290: tad yathâpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇâlaṃkāram abhibhavati /
T04sanss01u:293: evam eva kulaputrâśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittôtpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇâlaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti /
T04sanss01u:295: itaś ca vinâpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:297: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ /
T04sanss01u:299: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ /
T04sanss01u:301: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārājâivam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ... praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api
T04sanss01u:307: ātmanaś câtītânāgatapratyutpannāni sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvânumodasvâgrayânumodanayā
T04sanss01u:314: sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayâivaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ
T04sanss01u:315: san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi
T04sanss01u:318: sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo-
T04sanss01u:322: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyôpapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi /
T04sanss01u:323: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya
T04sanss01u:325: api ca mahārājâikam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvôttāraṇârambaṇatvāt sarvasatvâmocanârambaṇatvāt
T04sanss01u:335: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra
T04sanss01u:347: śrāvakayānam evâsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti /
T04sanss01u:355: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyâpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate /
T04sanss01u:356: yatra vâsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyôpadeśas tatrâbhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vâdikarmikabodhisatvena na
T04sanss01u:362: na câtra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati /
T04sanss01u:364: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate /
T04sanss01u:370: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vânuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyârabdhavīryo viharati
T04sanss01u:376: hy asya śikṣâtikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ côtpadyate /
T04sanss01u:379: atâiva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanss01u:380: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyâbhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvâbhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram
T04sanss01u:382: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt /
T04sanss01u:383: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvâpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ câdadato narakagatiḥ /
T04sanss01u:384: kiṃ punar anuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyâsaṃpādayataḥ /
T04sanss01u:390: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na
T04sanss01u:393: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya
T04sanss01u:394: paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvādêti /
T04sanss01u:396: syād yathâpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenôpanimantryôpekṣako bhaven nânnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet /
T04sanss01u:398: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyâtīrṇatāraṇāyâmuktamocanāyânāśvastâśvāsanāya yāvan na
T04sanss01u:399: bāhuśrutye 'bhiyogaṃ karoti nâpi tato 'nyeṣu bodhipakṣyakuśalamūleṣu dharmeṣu /
T04sanss01u:405: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyôttārayanti /
T04sanss01u:406: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā
T04sanss01u:410: punar aparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ kenacid evâdhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣv arthakaraṇīyeṣu /
T04sanss01u:411: tatra bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitā bhavati yāvad ātmaparityāgo 'pi
T04sanss01u:412: bodhisatvena kartavyo bhavet tatra na punaḥ sa satvo visaṃvādayitavyêti /
T04sanss01u:417: na punar yo 'ntaśâikam api yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na
T04sanss01u:418: rakṣati atha ca punar evaṃ vadati /
T04sanss01u:420: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako lokasyôcchedavādī
T04sanss01u:421: sa mūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kurute vinipātagāmī bhavatîti /
T04sanss01u:422: yāvat kālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvat kālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya
T04sanss01u:426: api prajñayâvagāhyôtsahatae eva sakaladuṣkhitajanaparitrāṇadhuram avavoḍhuṃ tena vandanapūjanapāpadeśanapuṇyânumodanabuddhâdhyeṣaṇayācanabodhipariṇāmanaṃ
T04sanss01u:439: nimantraye jagat sarvaṃ dāridryān mocitâsmi tat //
T04sanss01u:441: adyâgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā /
T04sanss01u:447: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ /
T04sanss01u:451: na câtra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmântarâpattiśaṅkā kartavyâtrâiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānânujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ /
T04sanss01u:455: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na
T04sanss01u:458: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ sâiva saṃśodhayiṣyatîty ukteḥ //
T04sanss01u:461: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vâvaśyaṃ gṛhâvāsān niṣkrāmati /
T04sanss01u:463: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhâvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti /
T04sanss01u:466: yathā janmântareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathâtrâiva
T04sanss01u:469: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate /
T04sanss01u:470: yenâpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya
T04sanss01u:486: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ //
T04sanss01u:498: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ /
T04sanss01u:511: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ /
T04sanss01u:512: tatra maitreya yêmāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen nâitāni
T04sanss01u:518: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsârthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati /
T04sanss01u:522: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni
T04sanss01u:525: dahyād evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād /
T04sanss01u:526: yo vânyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatvêmān evaṃrūpān dharmān
T04sanss01u:531: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
T04sanss01u:532: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti /
T04sanss01u:533: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:535: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamâṇurajaḥsamāḥ satva-s teṣām ekâikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpâdhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ /
T04sanss01u:540: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvâivam ucyamāno nô trasyati na
T04sanss01u:542: āpsyate 'ntaśâikacittôtpādenâpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na
T04sanss01u:549: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na
T04sanss01u:550: kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati /
T04sanss01u:568: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti /
T04sanss01u:570: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
T04sanss01u:571: kiṃ tarhi yānîmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu
T04sanss01u:576: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistarôktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ /
T04sanss01u:579: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrânteṣu
T04sanss01u:587: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena
T04sanss01u:593: ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyâitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmîti /
T04sanss01u:603: ksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya nântarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatîdaṃ devaputra prathamam
T04sanss01u:606: mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatîdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam
T04sanss01u:608: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyêty evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā
T04sanss01u:610: anutpannâniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam
T04sanss01u:613: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nântarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati
T04sanss01u:614: aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti //
T04sanss01u:620: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag /
T04sanss01u:626: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra
T04sanss01u:639: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:643: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ /
T04sanss01u:644: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam /
T04sanss01u:649: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ /
T04sanss01u:660: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpadyate
T04sanss01u:661: tathânyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:670: yo 'ham asyârthāya buddhaprajñaptāśikṣāyôddhuratād gatvâsmin putre 'tiriktataraṃ premôtpādayāmi /
T04sanss01u:672: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathâsya
T04sanss01u:680: nêha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā /
T04sanss01u:682: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ /
T04sanss01u:685: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanakôpasaṃkramya
T04sanss01u:689: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam
T04sanss01u:694: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ câinaṃ tyakṣyāmi /
T04sanss01u:695: etac ca vastu parityajyâhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi
T04sanss01u:696: etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati /
T04sanss01u:697: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca
T04sanss01u:699: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum /
T04sanss01u:700: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ /
T04sanss01u:710: mā paritāpsīs tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye /
T04sanss01u:717: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatrâprasādo bodhisatve vā
T04sanss01u:719: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ anavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cêdaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ //
T04sanss01u:721: catvārême śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante /
T04sanss01u:729: yasyême śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa
T04sanss01u:734: saṃkleśadharmo vatâyaṃ lokâmiṣaguruko vatâyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatâyam iti /
T04sanss01u:735: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti /
T04sanss01u:758: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe nôtsarjanacittam
T04sanss01u:759: utpādayen na sa parivārôpādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate /
T04sanss01u:760: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam
T04sanss01u:761: upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastûpādātavyaṃ /
T04sanss01u:763: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâivaṃ cittam
T04sanss01u:767: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat
T04sanss01u:768: kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi
T04sanss01u:769: satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastârthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādârthikebhyo netraṃ netrârthikebhyo dāsyāmi /
T04sanss01u:770: māṃsaṃ māṃsârthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitârthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjârthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgârthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi
T04sanss01u:771: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta
T04sanss01u:773: api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati
T04sanss01u:774: tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi /
T04sanss01u:783: tad yathâpi nāma kula-putra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā
T04sanss01u:784: hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā
T04sanss01u:786: puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya nâivaṃ bhavati
T04sanss01u:788: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti //
T04sanss01u:789: api tu khalu punar avikalpâiva hīnamadhyôtkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati /
T04sanss01u:790: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenâsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā
T04sanss01u:791: yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenârthaḥ tat tad eva me
T04sanss01u:795: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu
T04sanss01u:797: tad yathâpi nāmêmāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni
T04sanss01u:800: nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānôpabhogaṃ gacchanti /
T04sanss01u:801: evam evâham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānârambaṇair nānôpakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām
T04sanss01u:818: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ anuttarasukhôpadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ
T04sanss01u:821: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ... sarvajagatsthityātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan /
T04sanss01u:826: sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ /
T04sanss01u:832: dhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇôdyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan /
T04sanss01u:851: svaśarīrânadhyavasitasantānaḥ aniketasarvabuddhadharmânusmṛtivihāry- asārāc charīrāt sārâdānâbhiprāyêti hi
T04sanss01u:852: bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā
T04sanss01u:860: adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ maitryôpacārāṃ /
T04sanss01u:861: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru /
T04sanss01u:862: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi
T04sanss01u:872: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ
T04sanss01u:892: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā
T04sanss01u:897: sarvabodhisatvasamatôpāttair mahādānârambhair manasâkāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakair ananutāpyacittair dānavastubhiḥ
T04sanss01u:914: sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛtbukkāphupphuṣaṃ
T04sanss01u:917: prasannaprītyākārair netrair bodhisatvaniryātena premṇâvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenâsārāt kāyāt
T04sanss01u:923: yadi câham etadyācanakasyâitaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛtbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ /
T04sanss01u:932: svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatîty ātmabhāvôtsargaṃ kṛtvā //
T04sanss01u:934: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyânyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu
T04sanss01u:940: mayâiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyâbhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt /
T04sanss01u:943: snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayôpakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati /
T04sanss01u:966: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā
T04sanss01u:968: paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvâlaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathârhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan
T04sanss01u:969: putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vâpasṛjan /
T04sanss01u:971: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān
T04sanss01u:972: kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān
T04sanss01u:978: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /
T04sanss01u:983: yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy anekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhārôpacitā hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās
T04sanss01u:984: tāni buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyâdhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā dadānaḥ /
T04sanss01u:1007: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ
T04sanss01u:1013: dhisatvaguneṣu pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvâdhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi
T04sanss01u:1022: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan
T04sanss01u:1032: anapekṣacitto dadānaḥ parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo
T04sanss01u:1036: bhyo vâbhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne vā
T04sanss01u:1037: sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sâivaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati //
T04sanss01u:1038: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣûpadiṣṭaṃ /
T04sanss01u:1045: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
T04sanss01u:1046: anenâhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
T04sanss01u:1085: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān
T04sanss01u:1087: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
T04sanss01u:1088: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike
T04sanss01u:1096: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca
T04sanss01u:1110: yena ca sukhôpadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhôpadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti //
T04sanss01u:1118: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasâgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ
T04sanss01u:1191: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrâtyāgacittânutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtânupālanatayā /
T04sanss01u:1210: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā
T04sanss01u:1215: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca
T04sanss01u:1219: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittôtpādās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmîtîdam anāgatakauśalyaṃ //
